name: part_005
file: tmp_【ゲスト多数！新髪型お披露目！】昭和老人会♪宝鐘マリン3周年記念歌謡祭【hololive⧸宝鐘マリン】 [3LaDuoHDC_g]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: MC section with Ookami Mio and Shirakami Fubuki commentating on the previous performance.

subtitles.original: 汗が羽のかわりに飛んでる
subtitles.english: Sweat is flying instead of feathers.

subtitles.original: 何にこだわればいいの
subtitles.english: What should I be fixated on?

subtitles.original: 愛の見えない時代の恋人達ね
subtitles.english: Lovers in an era where love is invisible.

subtitles.original: まっさかさまに墜ちて desire
subtitles.english: Falling headlong, desire.

subtitles.original: 炎のように燃えて desire
subtitles.english: Burning like a flame, desire.

subtitles.original: 恋も dance, dance, dance, dance ほど
subtitles.english: Love also, just like a dance, dance, dance, dance,

subtitles.original: 夢中になれない なんてね 淋しい
subtitles.english: I can't get into it. How lonely.

subtitles.original: Get up, Get up, Get up, Get up, Burning heart
subtitles.english: Get up, Get up, Get up, Get up, Burning heart

subtitles.original: 腕を離してよ
subtitles.english: Let go of my arm.

subtitles.original: キスをされるのもごめん
subtitles.english: I'm sorry, I don't want to be kissed.

subtitles.original: 気分じゃないの
subtitles.english: I'm not in the mood.

subtitles.original: ヒールを脱ぎ捨て感じているのよ
subtitles.english: Throwing off my heels, I'm feeling it,

subtitles.original: 夜の孤独な長さを
subtitles.english: the length of the night's loneliness.

subtitles.original: そう 多分 贅沢な悩み
subtitles.english: Yes, it's probably a selfish worry.

subtitles.original: 分かっているわ これでも
subtitles.english: I know that, even so.

subtitles.original: 何を信じればいいの
subtitles.english: What should I believe in?

subtitles.original: スキャンダルさえ
subtitles.english: Even a scandal

subtitles.original: 時代のエクスタシィよ
subtitles.english: is the ecstasy of the era.

subtitles.original: ぶつかり合って 縺れ desire
subtitles.english: Colliding and tangling, desire.

subtitles.original: 星のかけらを 掴め desire
subtitles.english: Grasp the fragments of stars, desire.

subtitles.original: 夢はそうよ 見る前に
subtitles.english: Dreams, that's right, if they fade

subtitles.original: 醒めてしまったら
subtitles.english: before you even see them,

subtitles.original: 何にもならない
subtitles.english: they come to nothing.

subtitles.original: Get up, Get up, Get up, Get up
subtitles.english: Get up, Get up, Get up, Get up

subtitles.original: Burning love
subtitles.english: Burning love

subtitles.original: まっさかさまに墜ちて desire
subtitles.english: Falling headlong, desire.

subtitles.original: 炎のように燃えて desire
subtitles.english: Burning like a flame, desire.

subtitles.original: 恋も dance, dance, dance, dance ほど
subtitles.english: Love also, just like a dance, dance, dance, dance,

subtitles.original: 夢中になれない なんてね
subtitles.english: I can't get into it.

subtitles.original: 淋しい
subtitles.english: How lonely.

subtitles.original: Get up, Get up, Get up, Get up
subtitles.english: Get up, Get up, Get up, Get up

subtitles.original: Burning heart
subtitles.english: Burning heart

subtitles.original: Get up, Get up, Get up, Get up
subtitles.english: Get up, Get up, Get up, Get up

subtitles.original: Burning love
subtitles.english: Burning love

subtitles.original: 宝鐘マリン、常闇トワで『DESIRE -情熱-』でした！
subtitles.english: That was Houshou Marine and Tokoyami Towa with 'DESIRE -Jounetsu-'!

subtitles.original: はい、すごくパワフルな雰囲気で素晴らしかったですね！
subtitles.english: Yes, it had a very powerful atmosphere and was wonderful!

subtitles.original: そうですね、迫力がありましたね！
subtitles.english: It certainly did, it was very impactful!

subtitles.original: 今回ですね、このトワさんのこの中森明菜さんへのシナジーがすごくて...
subtitles.english: This time, the synergy Towa-san had with Akina Nakamori's style was amazing...

subtitles.original: マリンさんはこの歌お箱だったらしいんですけど、少し食われてしまったというお話でした
subtitles.english: Apparently, this is one of Marine-san's signature songs, but she said she felt a bit overshadowed.

subtitles.original: パワー負けしてしまいましたね。食われてしまったと言えば、そういえば一つ情報があるんですけども...
subtitles.english: She was outpowered. Speaking of being overshadowed, I actually have a piece of info here...

subtitles.original: 最近宝鐘マリンさんがハマっている食べ物があるそうで...
subtitles.english: Apparently, there's a food Houshou Marine-san has been into lately...

subtitles.original: マイブーム、しらすだそうです
subtitles.english: Her current obsession is whitebait.

subtitles.original: ※ハマっていません
subtitles.english: *She's not actually into it.

subtitles.original: 生しらすの方ですかね？
subtitles.english: Does she mean raw whitebait?

subtitles.original: あ、ちょっとそこまでは聞いてなかったんですけど...
subtitles.english: Ah, I didn't quite hear that much detail...

subtitles.original: 終わった時聞こうと思います
subtitles.english: I'll try asking her when it's over.

subtitles.original: というわけで、次の曲参りましょう。どうぞ！
subtitles.english: With that, let's move on to the next song. Here it is!

subtitles.original: 初恋の味はレモンのように酸っぱいそうです。
subtitles.english: They say the taste of first love is sour like a lemon.

subtitles.original: ですがキスの味も酸っぱいそうで。それでは聴いていただきましょう。初恋。
subtitles.english: But they say the taste of a kiss is also sour. Now, please listen to 'Hatsukoi'.

subtitles.original: 五月雨は緑色
subtitles.english: The early summer rain is green-colored.

subtitles.original: 悲しくさせたよ 一人の午後は
subtitles.english: It made me feel sad, this afternoon alone.

subtitles.original: 恋をして淋しくて
subtitles.english: Being in love and feeling lonely,

subtitles.original: 届かぬ想いを 暖めていた
subtitles.english: I was nursing my unreachable feelings.
